settings.headline: Pure Honest Ingredients
settings.text: We believe in the power of plants. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod .

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.subtitle: Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate
settings.content:
Stable and water-soluble, this gentle 
form of vitamin C is known for neutralizing free radicals, lightening dark spots, and supporting elasticity by triggering collagen synthesis.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.subtitle: D-alpha Tocopheryl Acetate
settings.content: With its abundant antioxidant properties, this fat-soluble form of vitamin E is known for combating signs of aging by neutralizing free radicals and limiting inflammation.

settings.title: Botanical  Hyaluronic Acid
settings.subtitle: Methylsulfonylmethane
settings.content: A naturally occurring humectant whose antioxidant properties and ability to draw in 1,000 times its weight in water support lasting tissue hydration and health.
